entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:29 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:17 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to snow overnight. Local rainfall amount 15 mm. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:17 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
